greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangular array T(n,k): in Pascal's triangle, draw vertical lines through binomial(n-1,k-1) (if present) and binomial(n-1,k) (if present); then T(n,k) is the sum of binomial(i,j) that lie on or between the lines and not below binomial(n,k).
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
